import { useState } from 'react'; function ReviewModal({ movieId, setReviews }) { const [comment, setComment] = useState(''); const [rating, setRating] = useState(''); const handleSave = () => { if (!comment || !rating) return; setReviews(prev => [...prev, { movieId, comment, rating: parseFloat(rating) }]); setComment(''); setRating(''); }; return ( <> {/* Trigger button */} {/* Modal */}
